original_title: Trump admin shifts strategy to sell voters on agenda: Focus on tax cuts | CNN Politics
article_summary: "President Trump's focus on the One Big Beautiful Bill Act has shifted to its tax provisions, which include individual and business tax cuts, as a key selling point for the midterm elections. Vice President JD Vance is expected to emphasize these tax cuts, particularly the child tax credit and deductions for older Americans, during a visit to Georgia."</s>
